result.title: Report on established synergies with EU policies (including parliamentary session)
result.description: A report of all documents, policy meetings and actrivities developed by the consortium related with the policy agroforestry development will be presented. The report will include the information related with the European Parliamentary session.

result.title: Reports on Communication Activities-1
result.description: A report following the evaluation that uses the methodology provided within the dissemination plan (communication strategy chapter) on the basis of KPIs monitoring. The analysis will be made every six months and results will be provided in two reports to be delivered to the EC at M18. A section including unintended and unexpected impacts will be also recorded and registered and associated contingency plans provided.
